metadata.title: CVE-2015-2940 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the CheckUser extensionfor MediaWiki allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofcertain users for requests that retrieve sensitive user information viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2940` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
